description: According to a new study, the planet is drying at an unprecedented pace, presenting a critical threat to humanity. description: In our news wrap Sunday, Canada, Australia, the United Kingdom and Portugal formally recognized a Palestinian state, Trump plans to nominate a senior White House aide as the new U.S. attorney in Virginia, the federal government’s annual report on hunger in America is being canceled, and California became the first state to ban law enforcement officers from wearing face coverings while on duty.
title: News Wrap: Four Western nations formally recognize a Palestinian state

description: A massive crowd gathered Sunday in Arizona for the memorial service of slain conservative activist Charlie Kirk. The memorial mixed music, prayer and calls to action, with Trump, Vance and many members of the administration among the speakers. For more on Kirk’s legacy, Ali Rogin speaks with journalist Kyle Spencer, author of “Raising Them Right,” a book about the conservative youth movement.
title: Tens of thousands attend memorial service for conservative leader Charlie Kirk

description: Cleveland Browns quarterback Shedeur Sanders made his feelings clear on his situation with the team, sitting behind both Joe Flacco and Dillon Gabriel.

description: Cloudflare launched 15 years ago this week. We like to celebrate our birthday by launching new products that give back to the Internet, which will do a lot of this week. But on this occasion we've also been thinking a lot about what's changed on the Internet and what has not.
